config.description: Prerelease branches are created from the master branch. These branches are used to master the next release. Once the prerelease is complete, it is merged into master.

Feature branches are created from the pre-release branch. These branches are used to pre-release new features for the upcoming or a distant future release. When a feature is complete, it is merged into pre-release.
Hotfix branches are created from the pre-release branch. These branches are used to pre-release emergency fixes to the production release. Once the hotfix is complete, it is merged into pre-release.

Bugfix branches are created from the pre-release branch. These branches are used to pre-release fixes for bugs found in the production release. Once the bugfix is complete, it is merged into pre-release.
Sync branches are created from the pre-release branch. These branches are used to sync the pre-release branch with the pre-release branch. Once the sync is complete, it is merged into pre-release.
